## ğŸ“Š Financial Tracking Areas

### Personal Finance
- **Income Tracking** - Track all sources of income
- **Expense Tracking** - Track and categorize all expenses
- **Asset Tracking** - Track assets and investments
- **Liability Tracking** - Track debts and liabilities

### Business Finance
- **Revenue Tracking** - Track business revenue and income
- **Expense Tracking** - Track business expenses and costs
- **Profitability Analysis** - Analyze business profitability
- **Cash Flow Management** - Manage business cash flow

### Investment Tracking
- **Portfolio Performance** - Track investment portfolio performance
- **Asset Allocation** - Monitor asset allocation and rebalancing
- **Return Analysis** - Analyze investment returns and performance
- **Risk Assessment** - Assess investment risk and volatility
